articles.title: Avinger (NASDAQ:AVGR) Upgraded to Hold at StockNews.com
articles.description: StockNews.com upgraded shares of Avinger (NASDAQ:AVGR – Free Report) from a sell rating to a hold rating in a research note released on Friday. Separately, HC Wainwright boosted their price target on Avinger from $1.60 to $5.00 and gave the stock a buy rating…
